name: 3D Motocross Snow Racing X - eXtreme Off-road Winter Bike Trials Racing Game FREE
name_original: 3D Motocross Snow Racing X - eXtreme Off-road Winter Bike Trials Racing Game FREE
description:
Rev up your engine, it’s time to unleash your dirt bike on some of the most wicked winter mountain roads available. Avoid falling rocks and treacherous cliffs as you race as far as you can go. Are you brave enough?

Features:
- 3 Rad Bikes to choose from
- Falling Rock hazards
- High quality 3D environment
